display.title: dyndns
display.label: dyndns
display.description: Maintains a DNS record so engines installation is always reachable without needing to know current external ip

start.content:
#!/bin/bash

PID_FILE=/home/dyndns/dyndns.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh

touch /tmp/start_dyndns

mkdir -p /home/engines/run/flags

if ! test -f /home/dyndns/dyndns.conf
then 
	touch /home/engines/run/flags/not_configured
	sleep 20  #wait for system apply pending configuration
	exit
else
   rm -f /home/engines/run/flags/not_configured
fi

ddclient  -daemon 300 -syslog -foreground -file /home/dyndns/dyndns.conf -cache /home/dyndns/cache   -pid /home/dyndns/dyndns.pid &

startup_complete

wait 
exit_code=$?
	
shutdown_complete

input.label: Domain name
input.comment: Domain name Configured with Dynamic DNS provider

set_script.content:
#!/bin/bash

. /home/engines/functions/params_to_env.sh
PARAMS_FILE=/home/engines/scripts/configurators/saved/dyndns_settings
parms_to_file_and_env

required_values="provider login login domain_name password"
check_required_values

cat /home/engines/templates/dyndns/providers/$provider/dyndns.conf.tmpl |sed --e /LOGIN/s//$login/ -e /PASSWORD/s//$password/ -e /DOMAIN/s//$domain_name/ >/home/dyndns/dyndns.conf 
chmod og-r /home/dyndns/dyndns.conf
echo "Success"
exit 0

read_script.content:
#!/bin/bash

if test -f /home/engines/scripts/configurators/saved/dyndns_settings
	then
		cat /home/engines/scripts/configurators/saved/dyndns_settings
	else
		echo ""
fi
exit 0
